snippet.title: Sonic Color Cursed - CGS 2021
snippet.description:
Sonic Color Cursed is a 2D speed based platformer, inspired by the Genesis classics with a 1-bit artstyle! Dr. Eggman is up to his antics again and this time he’s stolen all the color from the planet! Sonic and friends will have to put an end to Eggman’s plans with flying colors! Or else the world will forever cease to have color!


Check the game as soon as the 18th hits!
https://chaogameshowcase.wixsite.com/cgs2021/games
